review: Setup, scrolling, and video quality are all good but cannot keep a connection.  I have it connected to my phone's WIFI and it cannot stay connected more than 10 minutes.  Phone WIFI works perfect with everything else including smart TV.
author: kevin

review: I absolutely adore this thing.  For streaming I have used chromecast, xbox 360, xbone, and an hdmi enabled tablet, but the fire stick is by far my favorite.  I used a Roku 2 very briefly so I can't say how it stacks up in comparison, but it currently is the most regularly used device for streaming in my household.  I would definitely get another one should the need arise and only wished that I had bought an additional one when it was originally on sale!

review: Comes with a video tutorial, easy to install, and very easy to navigate. It's a little hard to get used to after viewing videos (Netflix, etc.) through my Nintendo Wii for so long.
